entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kamloops
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kamloops Airport 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
